question: How to become a Virginia's Insurance Marketplace Certified Agent
text:
How to become a Virginia's Insurance Marketplace Certified Agent
          
        
Please visit
Agents | VIM (virginia.gov)
and review the Requirements to become a Virginia's Insurance Marketplace Agent. If you meet all the requirements, please select one of the buttons in the Blue "Which Training Should I Take? section depending on your training status. Follow the instructions on the page on how to get Certified with Virginia's Insurance Marketplace.
